<<<api>>>: String.valueOf(Iterator.next())
<<<code>>>: for(Iterator<DataSnapshot> it = dataSnapshot.getChildren().iterator(); it.hasNext(); ){
i = i + 1;
names.add(String.valueOf(it.next().getValue(String.class)));
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can use the .getValue() method to get the value of the current child and then use the .toString() method to convert it to a string. The .valueOf() method can be used to convert the string to an integer.
